title: A Confidential Agent - Radio Drama
description:
A collection of tales, featuring unlikely private eye Liz Parker, her boss Mr Antrobus and Antrobus' secretary (and mistress) Gloria, all set in the unglamorous surroundings of Birmingham.

1: Poison In The Air - Liz goes in search of a missing person. Only, she must not tell Antrobus  1 X 45 mins

2: A Husband Scorned - Liz falls for a client, whose wife has left him  1 X 45 mins

3: Sharks Have Pearly Teeth - Liz gets involved in a case of industrial espionage and loan sharking. The answer though has impacts closer to home. 3 X 15 mins

4: Fire - The Ace Agency has a new owner - Liz herself. She, Antrobus and Gloria must investigate a case of suspected arson.  3 x 15 mins

All four stories have a good storyline, while retaining a tongue gently in cheek. Great fun.
